content: Impressive features, I look forward to making use of them to reduce the time I spend trying to get through to my GP's surgery. content: Downloaded this morning. You need NHS number, proof of ID (driver licence) and phone to scan your face to let the app compare with your ID picture. Also email address. Took me about 15mins to set up. Was then notified that checks could take up to 5 days to confirm but actually only took 10mins. The app works. Connects to my GP services. Had accurate record of my vaccines and able to print out my vaccination record which also has QR code - I assume that this will be able to be scanned by airport/travel staff, etc, in due course. It looks as though there were some teething troubles with it to start with but seems to be resolved now. It is definitely a useful tool for us to have now - I would recommend it

content: Can't seem to order a prescription at the moment
replyContent: We are very sorry to hear this. Can we ask you to send us some more information of the issues you encountered while trying to order your repeat prescription, so that we can fix and follow this up for you? You can do this by following this link: https://bit.ly/2TP6n9N and quote GS3999. Our team will be happy to help you.
